EmailTemplate.name: 2019BK-03 CNI 5000 ADS-B Out Upgrade EXTERNAL.2019BK-03 CNI 5000 ADS-B Out Upgra
EmailTemplate.subject: 2019 BendixKing Sales Bulletin Updates and Discounts
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]>
Sales Bulletin | February 2019
Thank you for being a valued customer. Here are this week's Sales Bulletins:
CNI 5000 ADS-B Out Upgrade BendixKing is pleased to offer a mandate compliance solution for CitationJet models 525 & 525A and the Citation Bravo (model 550) with Dealer Bulletin 2019BK-03 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019BK-03 CNI 5000 ADS-B Out Upgrade.pdf]]> and Operator Bulletin 2019BK_O_03 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019BK_O_03 CNI 5000 ADS-B Out Upgrade.pdf]]>.
The complete list of 2019 Sales Bulletins is available at myaerospace/parts & repairs/downloads/sales bulletins <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/parts-and-repairs/downloads/sales-bulletins#sort=%40fdisplayname2077%20descending]]>. Dealers must log in to view these bulletins.
Find your nearest BendixKing Area Sales Manager by visiting our website: https://www.bendixking.com/en/sales-team <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/sales-team]]>.
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
